name: Zealot #003 (1995-11-01) - Zealot.cbr

summary.description:
Zealot tells Voodoo about her final confrontation with Prometheus, back in World War II when he for was working for the Nazis and teaching them how to construct an atomic bomb.

Zealot must stop Promethos from giving the Nazi's the ability to create nuclear bombs even if it might cost Zealot her honor.

name: Zealot #002 (1995-10-01) - Zealot.cbr

summary.description:
Zealot is training with monks in feudal Japan when she learns that her sister has been captured by the dreaded Masked Warlord; She rides off to the rescue only to find that her foe is actually Prometheus and she has a difficult time getting her sister away from him.

In feudal , Zealot seeks training in not only sword fighting, but mental calmness. When a mysterious masked warlord kidnaps her sister Savant, that calmness is broken. Zealot must decide to break a promise or become a slave.

name: Zealot #001 (1995-08-01) - Zealot.cbr

summary.description:
Zealot in her own series! Zealot begins to tell Voodoo some of her origins and of her complicated relationship with Prometheus.

Zealot recounts a tale of a run in with a former Kherubim whom she rescued from imprisonment aboard ship that brought them to earth. Promethos in turn rescues Zealot from a group of her former sisters, The Coda, and makes her an offer to rule by his side.

name: Ythaq- The Forsaken World #003 (2009-04-01) - Book Three- Sigh Of The Stars.cbr

summary.description: The first-ever English adaptation of the critically acclaimed European science-fiction epic continues! After having survived their space shipwreck and saving Callista and the other passengers, Granite and Navarth turn their attention to keeping themselves and their fellow castaways alive. Setting off to search for food and explore the planet, their quest takes a near-disastrous turn when the monk Feng Tao mysteriously disappears. They're now on their own as they continue to venture through these strange lands, hoping against hope the secrets of survival on Ythaq will be revealed to them.
summary.name: Book Three: Sigh Of The Stars

name: Ythaq- The Forsaken World #002 (2009-03-01) - Book Two- Ophyde, The Gemini.cbr

summary.description: The first-ever English adaptation of the critically acclaimed European science-fiction epic continues! Shipwrecked on planet Ythaq, officers Granite and Navarth attempt to save Callista, the sumptuous passenger for whom they’re responsible. What they don’t know is that she stole the identity of the terrible military chief Ophyde and now seems to control the region. But what role does Dhokas the cruel mercenary play? It’s in the heart of the Kreac’h lagoon palaces that Navarth and Callista will make some surprising discoveries: Ythaq is a world where the echoes of many mysteries ring.
summary.name: Book Two: Ophyde, The Gemini

name: Ythaq- The Forsaken World #001 (2008-01-01) - Book 1- Terra Incognita.cbr

summary.description: The first-ever English adaptation of the critically acclaimed European science-fiction epic begins here. When the White Star Line space cruiser Comets Mist crash-lands on a mysterious plant, our heroes are thrust into a fight for survival amongst Ythaq's unsual inhabitants. Astronavigation Lieutenant Granite Welgoat, maintenance engineer Narvarth Bodissey and gold-digging beauty Callista de Saramore encounter all masnner of strange creatures as they explore the uncharted planet.
summary.name: Book 1: Terra Incognita

name: Your Name. #001 (2017-06-30) - Vol. 1.cbz

summary.description:
Based on the hit animated film!

Mitsuha, a high school girl from a town deep in the mountains, dreams of an unfamiliar life in Tokyo. Taki, a high school boy from Tokyo, dreams that he is a girl living in the mountains. As the two change places in their dreams, their encounter sets a miraculous story into motion.

Note: The digital edition (6/20/2017) for this volume was released before the print edition.
summary.name: Vol. 1

name: XIII #018 (2013-03-20) - The Last Round.cbr

summary.description: XIII and his friends have failed to recover Maximilian’s gold and are tired of hiding, running and struggling. When two books come out in the USA relating all the events of the amnesiac’s life and the details of the Conspiracy of the XX, they see it as a possible chance to come out in the open and trust in their country’s justice. But they still have enemies, at home and abroad, and everyone is set on a collision course...
summary.name: The Last Round

name: XIII #006 (2011-03-20) - The Jason Fly Case.cbr

summary.description: With the conspiracy that nearly claimed his life dismantled, XIII can finally turn all his attention towards uncovering his own distant past. Armed with everything he could find on Jason Fly—the man he seems to be—he heads to Green Falls, where he grew up. The problem with amnesia is that you never know exactly what you’ll dig up when you go home again. And... is everything really solved concerning the presidential assassination that cost him his memory?
summary.name: The Jason Fly Case

name: XIII #005 (2011-01-20) - Full Red.cbr

summary.description: XIII, Jones and Betty Barnowsky escaped the deadly trap set by Colonel McCall. Lost in a hostile jungle, they must now make their way back to America. And they must be quick: In Washington, every ally the fugitives ever had has been arrested in preparation for the conspirators’ master stroke, coinciding with a general exercise of all American armed forces: Operation Full Red. Suddenly, XIII’s quest becomes a last-ditch fight for the freedom of an entire nation.
summary.name: Full Red

name: XIII #004 (2010-11-20) - SPADS.cbr

summary.description: Now called Ross Tanner, XIII joins the elite SPADS (Special Assault and Destruction Squads) to try and learn more about Captain Rowland, his last identity. As if the shadowy threats hanging over his head weren’t enough, he also has to contend with gruelling training and a hostile instructor. Meanwhile, in Washington, investigations continue, and a series of clues emerge, pointing towards people XIII thought his allies. Can he trust Colonel Amos, General Carrington or… Lieutenant Jones?
summary.name: SPADS

name: XIII #003 (2010-09-20) - All the Tears of Hell.cbr

summary.description: Convicted of murder and sent to a high-security prison for the criminally insane, XIII finds himself not only unable to continue searching for his past, but also at the mercy of his enemies. Unbeknownst to him, though, General Carrington and the beautiful (and deadly) Lieutenant Jones are still trying to unravel the mystery of the presidential assassination. All they have to do is find a way to help him before he loses his life–or his mind.
summary.name: All the Tears of Hell

name: XIII #002 (2010-07-20) - Where the Indian Walks.cbr

summary.description: XIII is looking for a certain Kim Rowlands, a woman with whom he saw himself in a photograph. His search will yield a name—his, perhaps—and take him to a place that may be home. All families have secrets, though, and they can get a man killed. And what exactly do General Carrington and his beautiful aide Lieutenant Jones want with him?
summary.name: Where the Indian Walks

name: XIII #001 (2010-05-20) - The Day of the Black Sun.cbr

summary.description: A man washes ashore near an old couple’s house, barely alive. When he comes to, he has forgotten everything, including his name. The only clues to his identity: a key sewn into his clothes, a bullet wound to the head… and the number XIII tattooed on his shoulder. A meagre start to reconstruct one’s self.
summary.name: The Day of the Black Sun

name: X-Men- Magneto Testament #005 (2009-03-01) - Part 5 of 5.cbr

summary.description: The boy survived Kristallnacht, the Einsatzgruppe, and the Warsaw Ghetto. But now Max Eisenhardt faces Hitler's Final Solution in the death camp known as Auschwitz-Birkenau. What will it take to endure? Who are the Sonderkommando? And will a vision of a girl named Magda bring hope – or horror? The definitive origin story of Magneto reaches its shattering conclusion.
summary.name: Part 5 of 5

name: X-Men- Magneto Testament #003 (2009-01-01) - Part 3 of 5.cbr

summary.description:
The harrowing saga of young Magneto's struggle to save his family from the Nazi onslaught continues as the German army invades Poland--and our hero learns brutal new lessons and discovers new strength within himself. But even with all of his hard-won smarts and developing skills, how can one boy fight against the horrors of the Warsaw ghetto and the killing winter of 1941? It's a poignant Marvel Knights take on the life of a young Magneto, by Greg Pak (WORLD WAR HULK) and Carmine Di Giandomenico (DAREDEVIL: BATTLIN' JACK MURDOCK).

Spoilers:

The Eisenhardt's struggle to survive in a world quickly being dominated by the nazi regime. The Jewish people are being hunted down and forced to live off of 184 calories a day. (At this point, nazis are the ones rationing food to the Polish and Jewish people) Max sees a boy running with extra bread, people are chasing him for the food, and they knock him down. Max finds some extra bread and hands it back to the boy. Moments later, Max witnesses the boys murder at the hand of a Nazi soldier. Max grabs his penknife and attempts to kill the man, but his Uncle Eich stops him. The family continues to survive as Max smuggles food to his family. Ruth becomes ill. The family tried to escape Poland, but gets captured by the Nazis. A firing squad lines the family up and shoots. The bullets fly at Max's head, and he falls into the pit with his family. To his surprise he survives, and is put on a train to Auschwtiz.
summary.name: Part 3 of 5

name: X-Men- Magneto Testament #002 (2008-12-01) - Part 2 of 5.cbr

summary.description:
The definitive origin story of one of Marvel's greatest icons continues as young Magneto, a Jewish boy in Hitler's Germany, travels to Berlin with his father in a desperate attempt to secure protection from the Nazi menace. What new rules and skills must father and son learn to survive in this insane new world? And will those lessons be enough to save their family on the Night of Broken Glass?

It is 1936 and young Max (Magneto) struggles in Germany as the Nazi regime rises to power. Max and his father can no longer ride on trains, attend certain events, or talk to certain people because of their Jewish heritage. Max refuses to give in and even stands up for himself against those who have taken sides with the Nazis.

Max wakes up in the middle of the night to see military men breaking into houses a beating the Jewish inhabitants. Max takes his family out of the house and sees the temple being burned to the ground. Jewish stores are looted, and those who own them are forced to sell the businesses at an unfair price. Max and his family escape to Poland, only to find out that the Germans have invaded. The Polish army, which at the time were lancers on horseback, are forced to face an unmentionable force, German tanks.
summary.name: Part 2 of 5

name: X-Men- Magneto Testament #001 (2008-11-01) - Part 1 of 5.cbr

summary.description: Today, the whole world knows him as Magneto, the most radical champion of mutant rights that mankind has ever seen. But in 1935, he was just another schoolboy -- who happened to be Jewish in Nazi Germany. The definitive origin story of one of Marvel's greatest icons begins with a silver chain and a crush on a girl -- and quickly turns into a harrowing struggle for survival against the inexorable machinery of Hitler's Final Solution.
summary.name: Part 1 of 5

summary.description: Collects : X-Men (1991) #15
Collects : X-Men (1991) #14

name: X-Treme X-Men #006 (2002-10-01) .cbr

summary.description: Collects : X-Treme X-Men (2001) #06

name: X-Treme X-Men #004 (2002-08-01) .cbr

summary.description: Collects : X-Treme X-Men (2001) #04

The series conclusion -- with the most startling revelation of all! Why has this island evolved along a different path? Why is the flora and fauna of this place so hellish -- and so lethal? What secret does the island hold? The stunning finale to the series described as Alien meets Jurassic Park!

While Greer and Benga explore the vast nautical graveyard, Chuck slowly succumbs to the poisonous bug bite he received when they first landed on the island. Meanwhile... Keller, Marcus and Matt do a little exploring of their own as they follow Sarah's trail into the underground temple...which as it turns out isn't a temple at all but something far more bizarre -- something that could hold the secret to answering the mysteries of the island...

Things on the island turn from bad to worse. As different members of the team start to die, the surviving members get more desperate. Amidst the horrific creatures that inhabit the island, the team discovers a bizarre relic. How is it a key to the mystery surrounding the island? It's a pulse-poundnig journey that Wizard Magazine describes as "a creepy mix of King Kong and Alien" courtesy screenwriter and TV show producer Andrew Cosby, with Second Wave's Michael Alan Nelson and Sam and Twitch artist Greg Scott!

name: Escape from Wonderland #006 (2010-03-31) .cbr

summary.description: Calie must finally face her worst nightmare as the fate of the entire world lies in the balance. The mysterious and powerful Jabberwocky is intent on escaping from Wonderland and bringing his minions along for the ride. This is the issue that you've all been waiting for. The absolutely shocking and awe-inspiring conclusion to Zenescope's Wonderland trilogy is here! Ships with two separate covers!

name: Escape from Wonderland #005 (2010-03-31) .cbr

summary.description: Calie realizes that the choice she made has brought back her entire family. The world she left two years ago is back in place and everything is finally okay; in fact everything is finally great! The nightmare is over and a girl's life is back on track. Did it all even happen? Was it a dream? Unravel the mystery as the conclusion to the epic series approaches, the surprises will pile up and leave you jaw-dropped. It's time to learn the truth!

name: Escape from Wonderland #004 (2010-03-31) .cbr

summary.description:
Calie has her old life back. Everything is normal again, including her mom and dad. The perfect life she always dreamed of is actually real. As Calie pinches herself to make sure everything she isn't dreaming she realizes that she can have everything she ever wanted. But she isn't quite convinced of her surroundings as she gets a visit from Grandpa and is forced to make a decision that will change everything.

With limited edition e-bas covers (colored & sketch variant) from Fantastic Realm.

name: Escape from Wonderland #003 (2009-12-31) .cbr

summary.description: Calie continues her journey towards the Jabberwocky's lair and finds a friend in the Lizard creature she discovered last issue. But Calie finds that the closer she gets to her goal the more dangerous her path becomes. Strange creatures of every sort try to prevent them from reaching their destination but Calie is determined to let nothing stand in her way and will let nothing keep her from reaching her daughter.

name: Escape from Wonderland #002 (2009-10-31) .cbr

summary.description: As Calie treks through the ever-changing Wonderland terrain she comes face to face with a monstrous creature that may have deeper ties to her past than she realizes. Calie must find a way to reach out to the once human being in order for her to find her infant daughter. Meanwhile, Johnny finds he does not see eye to eye with the one calling the shots as a rift begins to develop between the two.

name: Escape from Wonderland #001 (2009-08-31) .cbr

summary.description: Two years ago you returned to Wonderland with Calie Liddle, a scared teenager who was led into the realm of madness to fend for her life. Last year you witnessed as Calie found madness had reached Beyond Wonderland into this world. Now it is time to see Calie in an entirely new light as she transforms into the hero she was destined to become and attempts to save her baby girl from the grips of madness itself! It is time for Carol Ann Liddle to once and for all Escape from Wonderland!

name: Wolverine MAX #002 (2013-01-01) - Permanent Rage Chapter Two.cbz

summary.description:
Meet Victor Creed!

As Logan investigates the crash that wiped his memory, he uncovers things about his past he didn't want to know!
summary.name: Permanent Rage Chapter Two

name: Wolverine MAX #001 (2012-12-01) - Permanent Rage Chapter One.cbr

summary.description:
ALL-NEW ONGOING SERIES!

Your favorite X-Man done the way you wanted to see him - in a no-holds-barred MAX series!

Written by award-winning crime novelist Jason Starr (PUNISHER MAX, The Chill)

In modern-day Tokyo, Logan gets pulled into a terrorist's plot...or was he the target all along?

A new look at Wolverine's past!
summary.name: Permanent Rage Chapter One

name: Logan #003 (2008-07-01) - Act Three of Three.cbr

summary.description: Wolverine lands, after being thrown through the air by Warren. A battle ensues with Warren, in firey-ash form, until he thrusts his hand into Wolverine's stomach. This causes Logan to have a flashback of him in a bathtub with Atsuko. He talk's of bringing her back the the States with him when he leaves Japan the following night. She says that she was born in Hiroshima, and will be proud to die in Hiroshima. He then pictures her bleeding, Warren with a sword, and the Nuke dropping. Back in the present, Logan is bleeding heavily from his stomach, while Warren is holding the heart he has just ripped from Wolverine's chest. Warren proceeds to swallow the heart and take Logan's coat. As Warren turns to leave, thinking Wolverine is dead, a gravely 'rrrr' comes from behind him. Warren attacks Wolverine, but to no avail as he is decapitated by the ol' Canucklehead. Things go white, and Logan is with Atsuko under a shade tree. She says that she can take away all his pain, but he will have to forfeit all memories of her. In doing so, this will sacrifice him of the pain of losing her. Out of the dream state, Logan regains consciousness as melting snow hits his face. He rises to find a beautiful sunset...alone in the woods.
summary.name: Act Three of Three

name: Logan #002 (2008-06-01) - Act Two of Three.cbr

summary.description:
Back in the present, Wolverine continues to battle with Warren. Wolverine slices through him on many occasions, until Warren throws him through the roof of the temple they are inside of.

It is now the next morning, and Atsuko is pouring tea for Logan after spending the night together. They visit for a little bit about they previous night until Logan's blood splatters across Atsuko's face. She turns to the door and finds Lt. Warren standing over her with a rifle.

Atsuko springs into action, grabbing a sword and slashing Warren. She dives at him to strike a killing blow, only to have Lt. Warren ram the bayonet on his rifle through her chest, killing her. Wolverine arises....

Logan slices and dices on Warren, but he simply won't die. As it turns out, Warren also has some sort of power that immunes him from getting hurt.

The two men fight for a few more pages until they see a plane flying overhead. It drops some sort of cargo, but it was to small and too fast for Logan to see what it is.

It was the Nuclear warhead used to demolish Hiroshima in WWII. An explosion occurs, and the effects are shown on cars, bikes, and various ruble. The last page shows Logan walk on a pile of debris, half a skeleton, and on fire.
summary.name: Act Two of Three

name: Logan #001 (2008-05-01) - Act One of Three.cbr

summary.description:
Logan travels through the snow to a temple in Japan. He is struck by a large fiery beast that is yelling "Your Turn."

The next panel is black, and goes on to show a soldier staring at him. The man in front of him is Lieutenant Ethan Warren, and he is a Prisoner of War in WWII, sharing a cell with Logan.

Wolverine comes up with a plan to escape and Warren agrees to help. They jump 3 soldiers who come to take the prisoners. The two prisoners escape into the woods, taking 2 of the guards guns.

They come upon a surprised young woman on a bridge. Warren and Logan debate whether or not they should kill her. Wolverine tells Warren to walk away, and Warren does so.

The young woman praises Logan for saving her life and says she'll hide him during the next day until he can escape. She says her name is Atsuko, and her father was a kamikaze fighter.

She proceeds to make love to him, and when he asks, "Is this Heaven?" she tells him that he is in Hiroshima. The final panel is the of a sunset overlaying Atsuko's house, with Logan thinking Hiroshima is just about the most beautiful word he'd ever heard.
summary.name: Act One of Three

name: Havok & Wolverine- Meltdown #004 (1989-10-01) - Endgame.cbr
Havok & Wolverine- Meltdown #003 (1989-07-01) - Duel.cbr
Havok & Wolverine- Meltdown #002 (1989-05-01) - Tender Loving Lies!.cbr
Havok & Wolverine- Meltdown #001 (1989-03-01) - Mexican Standoff.cbr

summary.description:
General Meltdown and Dr. Neutron discuss their plot to harness nuclear energy. The Chernobyl accident was caused by their failed attempt to control a nuclear explosion.

Havok and Wolverine share a companionable vacation in Mexico, indulging themselves in a bet to see who can go the longest without using their offensive mutant powers. An unknown party is surveilling the pair.

Their fun only seems to get more interesting as they are chased down by resentful thugs (who didn't like losing a fight to Logan in a bar) and end up stealing a hot car with an even hotter girl inside it.

They are pursued by a different group with hi-tech weaponry. Alex fires a plasma bolt to destroy the attackers. The woman takes a modified gun out of her purse and shoots Alex and Logan.

Logan wakes up in a hospital where he is told that he and Alex contracted the bubonic plague and that Alex has died.

Logan goes to Alex’s grave. With his heightened sense of smell, he realizes that the scent is wrong. He unearths the coffin to find that it has been stuffed with rocks. Logan vows to find out who has kidnapped Alex.
summary.name: Mexican Standoff

name: Tales of the Witchblade #004.cbr
Tales of the Witchblade #003.cbr
WildC.A.T.s Adventures #003 (1994-11-02) - Cry of the Coda.cbr

summary.description: Based on the teleplay “Cry of the Coda” by Brooks Wachtel
summary.name: Cry of the Coda

name: WildC.A.T.s Adventures #002 (1994-11-01) - Heart of Steel.cbr

summary.description: Based on the teleplay “Heart of Steel” by David Wise.
summary.name: Heart of Steel

name: WildC.A.T.s Adventures #001 (1994-09-01) - Dark Blade Falling.cbr

summary.description: Based on the teleplay “Dark Blade Falling” by David Wise
summary.name: Dark Blade Falling

name: WildC.A.T.S Trilogy #003 (1993-12-01) .cbr

summary.description: WildC.A.T.s is placed in a precarious predicament when Hightower has possessed the form of Voodoo and placed the members of the team in trouble. Zealot and Artemis' battle is interrupted by the Coda and the current majestrix, Andromache. Artemis reveals that the reason to lure out Zealot was two-fold: either she would meet death under Zealot's blade or she would rally Zealot to overtake the Coda and overthrow Andromache as majestrix. The Coda have come to take the heretic, Artemis, and kill her. Zealot and Artemis take on their Coda sisters while the WildC.A.T.s get free and are able to save Voodoo from Hightower. In the midst of battle, Artemis sacrifices her life for Zealot and the Coda departs, though not on friendly terms.

name: WildC.A.T.S Trilogy #002 (1993-09-01) - Hell Hath No Fury....cbr

summary.description: Zealot battles Artemis, who had captured Grifter to lure Zealot. Meanwhile, the Coda at Themiscyra gather due to the fact that Delphae has found the traitor of the sisterhood, the one who left. Artemis, who has been working with the Cabal, has ordered her partners to not interfere and if she were to lose the fight against Zealot, then Zealot and Grifter would be allowed to leave. Zealot defeats Artemis, but the Daemonites have no care for honor. Just then, the WildC.A.T.s arrive to even the odds. After another long battle, Artemis and Zealot continue to fight but are interrupted by the arrival of the Coda, looking for the heretic.
summary.name: Hell Hath No Fury...

name: WildC.A.T.S Trilogy #001 (1993-06-01) .cbr

summary.description:
Grifter finds himself in New York City, listening to an old associate named Lonely giving him some information involving an operation being led by the Cabal and the Coda. Unfortunately for the Grifter, Lonely was being paid to set Grifter up, but Lonely was soon killed after his job was done. Grifter is soon captured and Void is able to sense the trouble he is in. The Coda in charge, Artemis, reveals that she captured the Grifter so she could lure Zealot, the former Majestrix of the Coda. Zealot arrives, ready to battle Artemis and whomever else, to free Grifter.

Includes the first appearance of Gen 13 (Burnout, Freefall, Grunge, and Fairchild) in a preview pin-up of the team, then entitled Gen X.

name: Wildcats- Nemesis #007 (2006-05-01) - Hell Is For Heroes.cbr

summary.description: The Brotherhood's assault on Earth has begun! Nemesis and Zealot fight side by side, but the odds are stacked against them. Is anyone left to stem this massive threat? And Nemesis flashes back to Prohibition-era America to mix it up with bootleggers!
summary.name: Hell Is For Heroes

name: Wildcats- Nemesis #006 (2006-04-01) - The Nemesis Affair.cbr

summary.description: Raven and his Bladesman show their hand as their assault on Earth begins! Can Nemesis and Zealot set aside their millennia-long grudge long enough to join forces? And Nemesis visits Victorian England to help the world's greatest detective halt a string of serial killings...
summary.name: The Nemesis Affair

name: Wildcats- Nemesis #005 (2006-03-01) - Unforgiven.cbr

summary.description: Terrifying hybrid monsters assault the New York headquarters of HALO, pushing our heroes to the brink of doom! And a stark possibility creeps into the minds of the Wildcats: Could they have been wrong about Nemesis? Plus, this deadly femme fatale puts her personal stamp of "wild" on the old West and the small town of Snakeskin, Arizona!
summary.name: Unforgiven

name: Wildcats- Nemesis #004 (2006-02-01) - The Dark Side Of The Blade.cbr

summary.description: The Wildcats capture Nemesis and subject her to a harsh interrogation, unaware that they will soon become the target of even deadlier forces! And in ancient Greece, Nemesis engages in the vicious duel that will mark her as a traitor and set her upon a blood-soaked, millennia-spanning quest...
summary.name: The Dark Side Of The Blade

name: Wildcats- Nemesis #003 (2007-01-01) - The Dark Side Of The Blade.cbr

summary.description: Nemesis is in a fight to the death with a battalion of Daemonites when unexpected aid arrives…but can they protect themselves and the child Kara simultaneously? And the millennium-old betrayal is at last revealed - but it's not what anyone expects!
summary.name: The Dark Side Of The Blade

name: Wildcats- Nemesis #002 (2005-12-01) - Devil-May-Care.cbr

summary.description: WildStorm's hot new miniseries continues! Nemesis has taken her hostage - the child Kara - to a safe house in Manhattan while she plots her next move…until a Daemonite assault force disrupts everything! Meanwhile, learn the tumultuous past Nemesis shares with Zealot - and the truth is astounding!
summary.name: Devil-May-Care

name: Wildcats- Nemesis #001 (2005-11-01) - The Art Of Living Dangerously.cbr

summary.description:
Zealot and her Coda sisters are the elite warrior-class on their homeworld of Khera, feared throughout the galaxy. A single name, however, strikes fear and hatred into their hearts: Nemesis! Framed for the betrayal and slaughter of the Kheran military forces on Earth at the dawn of mankind, rogue warrior Charis Adrastea embarks on an epic quest to avenge the massacre, uncovering a conspiracy that threatens the entire universe. Hunted by friend and foe alike, she takes the name "Nemesis" ? from the Greek goddess of vengeance, whose myth she inspires. Now, as her blood-soaked quest nears its end, only the Wildcats can stop her! This miniseries plunges readers into the midst of the one-woman war Nemesis has been fighting for millennia. Each issue features a present-day sequence with art by Caldwell as she nears her quest's end, and a flashback with art by Domingues that reveals her origins and follows her vendetta as it spans human history!

A spectacular new chapter in the WildStorm Universe is revealed in this exciting 9-issue miniseries written by Robbie Morrison (THE AUTHORITY) with art by Talent Caldwell (SUPERMAN: GODFALL), Horacio Domingues (Lazarus Jack) and Matt Banning (Uncanny X-Men, The Darkness)! Zealot and her Coda sisters are the elite warrior-class on their homeworld of Khera, feared throughout the galaxy. A single name, however, strikes fear and hatred into their hearts: Nemesis!

Framed for the betrayal and slaughter of the Kheran military forces on Earth at the dawn of mankind, rogue warrior Charis Adrastea embarks on an epic quest to avenge the massacre, uncovering a conspiracy that threatens the entire universe. Hunted by friend and foe alike, she takes the name "Nemesis" - from the Greek goddess of vengeance, whose myth she inspires. Now, as her blood-soaked quest nears its end, only the Wildcats can stop her!

This miniseries plunges readers into the midst of the one-woman war Nemesis has been fighting for millennia. Each issue features a present-day sequence with art by as she nears her quest's end, and a flashback with art by Domingues that reveals her origins and follows her vendetta as it spans human history!
summary.name: The Art Of Living Dangerously

name: Wildcats #021 (2001-03-26) - Sodom and Modem (Part 2).cbr

summary.description: Special guest artist Steve Dillon (PREACHER, Punisher), concludes a 2-part story! It's all-out action as the FBI finally captures Jeremy Stone. Plus, Grifter battles Agent Orange, an unstoppable mystery-man who may one day become an important component in the WILDCATS' scattered lives.
summary.name: Sodom and Modem (Part 2)

name: Wildcats #016 (2000-12-26) - Serial Boxes, Part 3- Searing Copulation.cbr

summary.description: Part 3 of a deadly 6-part story finds a popular member of Wildcats becoming the latest victim of a brutal serial killer! After the sadistic confrontation that occurs this issue, things will never be the same for the 'Cats as the gruesome "Serial Boxes" continues.
summary.name: Serial Boxes, Part 3: Searing Copulation

name: Wildcats #010 (2000-04-01) - Deal of the Century.cbr

summary.description: The first storyline from the creative team of writer Joe Casey and artist Sean Phillips concludes as the final fates of both Lord Emp and the immortal villain, Kenyan, are revealed! Their secret history finally out in the open, the unexpected ending to this century-long conflict will shock new and longtime readers alike, with the WILDCATS cast changing dramatically as a result.
summary.name: Deal of the Century

name: Wildcats #009 (2000-03-26) - Set My Soul on Fire.cbr

summary.description: The new creative team of writer Joe Casey and artist Sean Phillips hits new heights with a wild Las Vegas adventure! The Wildcats hit Vegas as the screws tighten on Emp and Kenyan! The search for all the answers continues as more of Kenyan's secrets are revealed. While Emp gambles on his future as a High Lord of Eternal Light, the Wildcats find themselves unexpectedly caught up in a casino heist masterminded by a former supervillain.
summary.name: Set My Soul on Fire

name: Wildcats #007 (2000-03-26) - To Kill a Wildcat.cbr

summary.description: The return of the most eagerly anticipated character of all! One of the longest-running subplots of the original WILDC.A.T.S was Pike's pledge to kill a WILDC.A.T.! Now the villain finally gets his chance on the war-torn streets of Sarajevo. But Pike's about to learn that WILDCATS don't die easy! It's the return of the only WILDCAT who hasn't appeared yet, one who's finally here and looking quite sharp! It's a special self- contained issue illustrated by guest artist Carlos Meglia (CRIMSON SPECIAL: SCARLET X — BLOOD ON THE MOON).
summary.name: To Kill a Wildcat

name: Wildcats #004 (1999-09-26) - Firefight.cbr

summary.description: The dramatic events bridging the gap between WILDC.A.T.S Volume 1 and the exciting WILDCATS Volume 2 are finally revealed! What caused the 'Cats to split apart? Where are Zealot and Warblade? Venture into the not-too-distant past as a routine WildC.A.T.s mission to Ireland turns into an unforgettable nightmare. Grifter, Zealot, Warblade, Voodoo, and Spartan find themselves in a gruesome battle they cannot win ‹ a battle that tests their friendship, loyalty and faith in one another as their survival hangs in the balance.
summary.name: Firefight

name: Wildcats #002 (1999-05-26) - Second Skin.cbr

summary.description: Ever wonder why they call her Voodoo? Priscilla is about to find out when she meets a Daemonite Shaman prepared to teach her exactly why their alien race is the most feared and hated in all the Omniverse! (Hint: It has surprisingly little to do with their fangs, talons and impenetrable armored hides!) Plus, more about Dr. Jeremy Stone ‹ now the massive Maul ‹ and his efforts to help Priscilla rid herself of her alien genetic heritage... and the awesome price he and Priscilla both must pay in the process. Does that sound like a lot for one issue? Welcome to the world of the all-new, all-different Wildcats... now buckle in and enjoy the trip!
summary.name: Second Skin

name: Wildcats #001 (1999-03-26) - Balance of Terror.cbr

summary.description: The series that launched Jim Lee's WildStorm Productions returns as the first new book to be released by WildStorm under the wings of DC Comics, in a special edition featuring six different covers!
summary.name: Balance of Terror

name: WildCats #011 (2009-07-01) - Alamo.cbr

summary.description:
The Wildcats' visit to the takes a turn for the worse when they learn a dark secret that Majestic wanted kept hidden, and he’ll kill to protect it! To make matters worse, when the 'Cats are away, the Daemonites decide to play as Defile and his army launch an all-out assault on the HALO building, which is full of helpless survivors.

Also, it’s the start of a backup story explaining why Deathblow isn't dead, featuring the incredible art of Chris Sprouse (NUMBER OF THE BEAST, TOM STRONG)!
summary.name: Alamo

name: WildCats #005 (2009-01-01) - Who Is Spartan.cbr

summary.description:
Artist extraordinaire Pete Woods (AMAZONS ATTACK, CYBERNARY) joins writer Christos Gage (STORMWATCH PHD, WILDSTORM: REVELATIONS) for a unique look at Spartan and how post-apocalyptic Earth has affected the resolute android. He's been many things during his long existence on Earth – warrior, bodyguard, CEO – but what challenges does this astounding new world order hold for him

A backup tale spinning out of NUMBER OF THE BEAST also begins with Gage and artist Wes (WILDSTORM: REVELATIONS) Craig at the steering wheel!
summary.name: Who Is Spartan?

name: WildCats #004 (2008-12-01) - Eden, Part Two.cbr

summary.description: It's a rumble in the jungles of Nevada as the Wildcats tangle with old allies! But what secret does this lush oasis hold and could it be the answer to the Earth's needs? And how does it all connect to a character from NUMBER OF THE BEAST? Plus, Cybernary returns as a new backup begins with Gage and artist Pete Woods!
summary.name: Eden, Part Two

name: WildCats #003 (2008-11-01) - Eden, Part 1.cbr

summary.description: As the Wildcats attempt to rebuild their shattered world one piece at a time, a glimmer of hope is offered in a rumored oasis in the Nevada desert that literally sprang up out of nowhere after the Apocalypse. Could this be the fabled Nevada Garden? And what ex-member of StormWatch: PHD stands in the way of them finding out? Also, a new backup story begins focusing on Marc Slayton, the original Backlash, by writer Christos Gage and artist Mike McKone.
summary.name: Eden, Part 1

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #049 (1998-05-01) - When Worlds Collide Part 2.cbr

summary.description: It all comes to a head. Gina, an operative of the Puritans, has made it back to the dawn of time when aliens first arrived on Earth. Will she succeed in destroying the Kherubim and Daemonite bloodlines forever, or can the WildC.A.T.s, who have already lost two members on their trek back through time, stop her? It's an action packed and explosive conclusion to the biggest WildC.A.T.s adventure of all time!
summary.name: When Worlds Collide Part 2

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #048 (1998-04-01) - When Worlds Collide Part 1.cbz

summary.description: It's an all out war between the Kherubim and the Daemonites. Stuck in the middle of it all are the WildC.A.T.s desperately trying to prevent the Puritans from changing the course of history. This penultimate issue to the Cat's biggest adventure has action, intrigue, and more character defining moments than you can shake a stick at.
summary.name: When Worlds Collide Part 1

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #047 (1998-03-01) - Memories of Tomorrow.cbr

summary.description: The Puritans, a highly technologically advanced organization, has sent an elite strike force back in time to eradicate the Kherubim and Daemonite bloodlines from the face of the planet forever. Hot on their heels, the WildC.A.T.s arrive in the far flung past onboard the very space vessel that brought the Kherubims to planet Earth. Get an insightful look at characters like Zealot, Marlowe, Savant, and Majestic as they were thousands of years ago.
summary.name: Memories of Tomorrow

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #046 (1998-02-01) .cbz

summary.description: Can the Cats survive a stint as gladiators? Maybe with a little help from a certain super-powerful Kherubim Lord. What is the diabolical Helspont doing in ancient Rome? Plus, will another member of the team fall by the wayside?

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #045 (1998-01-01) - Circus Maximus.cbr

summary.description: Sister Eve has made the ultimate sacrifice so that her teammates can continue their pursuit of the Puritans, a secret cabal who are hellbent on traveling back through time and destroying the Kherubim and Daemonite bloodlines at their source. Next stop...ancient Rome and the Coliseum! Plus, the surprise return of a villain from the WildC.A.T.s past.
summary.name: Circus Maximus

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #043 (1997-10-01) - The High Road To China.cbr

summary.description: The WildC.A.T.s adventure back through time continues and they next find themselves in the Himalayan Mountains and cross paths with a certain explorer by the name of Marco Polo. It's on these snow cape peaks that, after a near death experience, Olympia and Max Cash discover they have a growing affection for one another.
summary.name: The High Road To China

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #042 (1997-09-01) - Endangered Species, Part. 2 - Brothers In Arms.cbr

summary.description: As the WildC.A.T.s pursue the Puritans back through time they find themselves in the middle of World War I. There two Red Cross soldiers with familiar faces (Ernest Hemingway and Frank Cash, Grifter and Max's grandfather) help them avoid the Axis troops. But things get worse when they discover a Daemonite warlord plans to turn the tide of the war by unleashing toxic gas!
summary.name: Endangered Species, Part. 2 : Brothers In Arms

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #040 (1997-07-01) - Survival Of The Species, Part. 4 - Fight Or Flight.cbr

summary.description: The Puritans attacked the WIldC.A.T.s on their home turf, now it's their turn to repay the favor. But when the team storms the Puritan's headquarters they learn the disturbing magnitude of the organization's plans. They plan to travel back in time to when the Kherubim and Daemonite first arrived on Earth and destroy the alien bloodline before it can begin.
summary.name: Survival Of The Species, Part. 4 : Fight Or Flight

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #039 (1997-06-01) - Survival Of The Species, Part. 3 - Predator & Prey.cbr

summary.description: The mysterious Coda trained Olympia's secret is revealed. And, Zealot challenges her to a dual to the death. Plus, the Puritans enact an all out assault on the WildC.A.T.s' headquarters.
summary.name: Survival Of The Species, Part. 3 : Predator & Prey

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #037 (1997-04-01) - Survival Of The Species, Part. 1 - Hunting Season!.cbr

summary.description: With half the team leaving, tensions continue to boil between Grifter and John Colt over the affections of Zealot. Plus, Max Cole uncovers a conspiracy that could change the landscape of humanity for all time.
summary.name: Survival Of The Species, Part. 1 : Hunting Season!

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #036 (1997-03-01) - Taking Leave (Part 2).cbr

summary.description: The immensely powerful warrior known as Crusade has declared war on the WildC.A.T.s. The hero Union has arrived on the scene, but is he here to help the Cats, or his former ally, Crusade?
summary.name: Taking Leave (Part 2)

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #035 (1997-03-01) - Taking Leave (Part 1).cbr

summary.description: An immensely powerful warrior by the name of Crusade, whose sole purpose is to hunt down and kill aliens, attacks, and not even Majestic and Zealot maybe strong enough to defeat him. Luckily, Union drops by to lend a hand.
summary.name: Taking Leave (Part 1)

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #021 (1995-07-01) .cbr

summary.description: With the WildC.A.T.s off the planet and believed dead, Savant and Mr. Majestic decide to create their own team of WildC.A.T.s to continue the cause. The roster of this new team is significantly more dangerous and unsavory than the previous incarnation, but that's the kind of brutality that Savant believes would work well for the team. To recruit their last member, Ladytron, Savant and the others investigate a restaurant that is the setting for a drug deal. They are able to get Ladytron, as well as a criminal with knowledge of crime activity on the East coast, though they had to knock Ladytron out.

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #018 (1995-03-01) .cbr

summary.description:
Story 1

Void prepares to enter the mind of Voodoo, who has been in a comatose state for some time. Meanwhile, Grifter is battling Daemonites so he can find out who was the one behind ordering a shape-shifting Daemonite to infiltrate the WildC.A.T.s. He learns from his interrogation that the one behind it is Hightower, a Daemonite the WildC.A.T.s have crossed paths with in the past. While Grifter continues his search, Void goes through Voodoo's psyche, helping her battle whatever is causing her to remain comatose, and succeeding. Grifter calls his teammates, telling them that he has learned that Hightower is going to meet some Coda assassins in Washington, DC.

Story 2: Wedding Day Jitters

A back-up story involving a past adventure of Savant.

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #016 (1994-12-01) - End Program.cbr

summary.description: Ben Santini, the leader of the Black Razors, reveals to his priest that he fears that he will kill the man that injured him many months ago, Lord Emp. The Black Razors then undergo their mission, to stop the Daemonites from attacking important industrialists, and find out that a Daemonite with shape-shifting abilities is masquerading as a member of the WildC.A.T.s. The Razors attack the WildC.A.T.s in the hope of exposing the masquerade. They eventually learn that Maul is the one being impersonated and Ben Santini is left with a problem: attack the Daemonite or kill Lord Emp, the man he blames for the misery in his life. He shoots the Daemonite and lets the WildC.A.T.s to ponder where the real Maul is.
summary.name: End Program

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #015 (1994-11-01) .cbr

summary.description: The WildC.A.T.s gather in Aspen, Colorado because Emp was called there to be part of an energy committee. He tells his team that they could enjoy some free time in Aspen or wherever they would like. Just then, a helicopter attacks their abode, guns blazing through the windows and walls. Meanwhile, Ben Santini is the head of the Black Razors and has the mission of protecting the industrial leaders that are part of the energy committee because they are being targeted by Daemonites. While the Black Razors enjoy some down time before their mission, one of them is attacked by some Daemonites. The team go on their mission and protect an industrialist from a Daemonite attack. After the battle, the Black Razors learn that a Daemonite with shape-shifting abilities is masquerading as a member of the WildC.A.T.s to get close to Emp, to kill him.

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #009 (1994-03-01) - Past Time.cbz

summary.description:
An ancient foe from Marlowe's past has come seeking revenge. Will Spartan and Voodoo pay for crimes Lord Emp committed centuries ago? Or can the rest of the team arrive in time to save the day? Plus, Warblade stars in "The Bonds of Blood & Steel!

Lord Entropy has Lord Emp, Spartan and Voodoo captive and the rest of their teammates are searching for them. Lord Entropy explains how he was waiting for this time to enact his revenge on Emp, but Emp has no memory of Lord Entropy. Lord Entropy explains in the medieval times they were soldiers and partners and they had a mission to save Lord Entropy's wife from Brannach the Black. They were able to defeat Brannach, who was possessed by a Daemonite, but the Daemonite then possessed Lord Entropy's wife. Emp was forced to kill her and Lord Entropy never forgave Emp. The WildC.A.T.s arrive and are able to defeat Lord Entropy with teamwork. After the battle, Lord Emp reconsiders leading the WildC.A.T.s and reveals to void that Entropy was his brother.
summary.name: Past Time

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #007 (1994-01-01) - Killer Instinct- Chapter Three, Showdown.cbr

summary.description:
Story continued from Cyberforce (1993 2nd Series) #2. It's all out war as the WildC.A.T.s and the cyborg mutant heroes of Cyberforce are manipulated into a no holds barred battle by the machinations of the woman called Misery. What is the secret from the past that connects Warblade and Ripclaw to this mysterious woman, and why are they willing to kill each other for her? Story concludes in Cyberforce (1993 2nd Series) #3.

Cyberforce arrives at the Isle of the Dead to investigate where the WildC.A.T.s are. Due to Misery's telepathy clouding Cyberforce's minds, they believe that the WildC.A.T.s are part of the Cyberdata and are bio-synthetic organisms created to cause trouble. WildC.A.T.s and Cyberforce battle on the island and Ripclaw and Misery are able to escape the melee, finding the technology that Misery really wanted from the island. Before they could escape, Warblade arrives for one final battle.

Continued in Cyber Force #3.
summary.name: Killer Instinct: Chapter Three, Showdown

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #006 (1993-12-01) - Killer Instinct- Chapter One.cbr

summary.description:
The WildC.A.T.s and the cyborg mutants of Cyberforce find themselves at odds, especially the razor fisted heroes Warblade and Ripclaw. And it's all because of the woman named Misery. Story continues in Cyberforce (1993 2nd Series) #2.

After the events of the last issue where a facility in Gamorra exploded, Gamorran airships come to investigate and attack the WildC.A.T.s. They are blasted out of the sky but the WildC.A.T.s are able to recover, with everyone on the team making it to the ground without being harmed much. Void teleports Voodoo back to the headquarters, due to her injuries, while the rest of the team search the facility to find their teammate, Warblade. They soon find Misery in the wreckage, taking Warblade with her. She soon teleports out with their teammate and they find a stasis pod in the wreckage, something Misery was trying to get before the WildC.A.T.s returned. Misery ends up with Warblade off the coast of Gamorra, on the Isle of the Dead. Warblade, upon gaining consciousness, attacks Misery but is stopped in his tracks when Ripclaw from Cyberforce arrives, ready to battle for Misery and under her telepathic thrall.

Continued in Cyber Force #2.
summary.name: Killer Instinct: Chapter One

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #004 (1993-03-01) - Resolution.cbz

summary.description:
The Daemonite Warlord known as Helspont stands at the cusp of total victory. Soon he'll be joined by hordes of his alien Daemonite brethren. The only thing standing in the way of Earth and Armageddon is the WildC.A.T.s.

Youngblood and some members of WildC.A.T.s join together to stop Helspont from bringing his fellow aliens, the Daemonites, to Earth so they could conquer it. Helspont proves to be a formidable foe and is able to rebuff their attack. The rest of the WildC.A.T.s team regroups and give chase to Helspont, leading to a massive battle. Helspont reveals he has a power orb that could power up the transport of his fellow Daemonites when the Gnome and his Triad arrives to steal the orb, blasting Helspont out of the fray. Knowing the orb is too powerful to be allowed in anyone else's hand, Emp blasts the Gnome's arm off and the orb falls down. The Gnome chases after him and the whole facility they are in explodes. Youngblood is able to escape and ponder the fate of the WildC.A.T.s.

The issue ends with a short preview of Larry Stroman's "The Tribe" (Image, 1993).
summary.name: Resolution

name: WildC.A.T.s- Covert Action Teams #002 (1992-10-01) - Revelations.cbr

summary.description:
Psionic backlash from the Cat's passing blows their cover. The government can't have rogue Action Teams roaming the countryside so they send their elite enforcers - the Black Razors - to bring down the WildC.A.T.s. 1st appearance of the Troika (cameo) and Master Gnome. 1st appearance of Black Razor (think Boba Fett on steroids), the armored special forces unit put together to deal with meta humans.

Story 1: Revelations

I/O leader, John Lynch, investigates the explosion that occurred near Washington, D.C. and finds Void teleporting in with the team of WildC.A.T.s. They then immediately teleported away, back to Emp's headquarters at the Halo company. Once there, they inform Voodoo about what's going on, how two alien forces, the Daemonites and the Kherubium, have been at war and have spread it, in secret, to the planet Earth. The Deamonites have the ability to possess other beings while the Kherubium have bred with Earthlings, granting people with superhuman powers. Before too long, John Lynch sends the Black Razors to infiltrate the WildC.A.T.s. and Lynch asks for their assistance. They soon learn, thanks to Voodoo, that the Vice President of the United States is actually a Daemonite and have to stop him. Unfortunately, the Vice President is being protected by members of Youngblood, a superhero force team. In the shadows, Gnome is pleased that he has planned all this to his benefit.

Story 2: Wetworks

This story introduces the Wetworks.
summary.name: Revelations

name: WildC.A.T.s Annual #001 (1998-02-01) - None.cbr
Welcome to Tranquility #012 (2008-01-01) - No More Crossovers!.cbz

summary.description:
Overview

Written by Gail Simone; Art and Cover by Neil Googe

It's a battle royal as the citizens of Tranquility take to the skies to battle the undead Astral Man! Can the heroes overcome the greatest threat ever to their city?
summary.name: No More Crossovers!

name: Welcome to Tranquility #011 (2007-12-01) - A Fire To Believe In.cbz

summary.description:
Overview

A plague of the undead has overtaken the town of Tranquility! Heroes and villains alike fight for their lives while the zombie masses keep coming. Is there anyone living — or dead — that can save the day?
summary.name: A Fire To Believe In

name: Welcome to Tranquility #010 (2007-11-01) - A Hand Meant for God.cbz

summary.description:
Overview

Secrets will be revealed in this ground-breaking issue! Sheriff Lindo finally learns the truth of why her grandfather left her family, just as some dead residents start appearing in town — feasting upon residents!

Zombies!
summary.name: A Hand Meant for God

name: Welcome to Tranquility #009 (2007-10-01) - Sub-Divided.cbr

summary.description:
Tommy tries to confirm suspicions of a zombie outbreak just as some old faces return to Tranquility.

Backup Story: The origins of the Coyote Kid!
summary.name: Sub-Divided

name: Welcome to Tranquility #008 (2007-09-01) - What You Really Want!.cbr

summary.description: It's a summer spectacular with three special tales of Tranquility! Join the fearsome Lindo Sisters in a time when they weren't so respectable, see the rock n' roll origin of the gravedigger Zombie Zeke, and follow master thief the Emoticon as he attempts a score no other criminal would dare!
summary.name: What You Really Want!

name: Welcome to Tranquility #007 (2007-08-01) - Time of the Season.cbr

summary.description:
Overview

Tranquility is no longer the small, quiet town it was,

and Sheriff Lindo has her hands full keeping it from getting worse! Whether it's the continuous incarceration of dangerous super folks or strange teenage visitors in town, it's definitely going to be a difficult week!
summary.name: Time of the Season

name: Welcome to Tranquility #006 (2007-07-01) - Fade to Grey, Finale.cbz

summary.description: The opening arc comes to an astounding conclusion as the murder of Mister Articulate is finally solved...but at what cost? Will the revelation tear Tranquility apart - literally?
summary.name: Fade to Grey, Finale

name: Welcome to Tranquility #005 (2007-06-01) - Too Much For The Man.cbz

summary.description: It's a generational battle to the death as the still-plucky seniors of Tranquility face the town's angry, super-powered youth team, the Liberty Snots. But that's only part of the story, as the finger is finally pointed at the town's traitor, who will do anything to keep his secret.
summary.name: Too Much For The Man

name: Welcome to Tranquility #004 (2007-05-01) - Silver Crown Won't Let You Down!.cbz

summary.description: The townsfolk are stunned at the recent tragedies, but Sheriff Lindo is putting the pieces of the puzzle together. Is she any closer to catching the killer or will more citizens die before this story reaches its astounding conclusion?
summary.name: Silver Crown Won't Let You Down!

name: Welcome to Tranquility #003 (2007-04-01) - A Pretty Girl Is Like A Melody.cbz

summary.description: What's it like for super-powered teenagers living in a town, where the adventures of the town's residents are legend? And what dark secret could be the key to the murder of Mr. Articulate?
summary.name: A Pretty Girl Is Like A Melody

name: Welcome to Tranquility #002 (2007-03-01) - Snake in the Grass.cbr

summary.description: The intriguing new series by Gail Simone (BIRDS OF PREY) and Neil Googe (MAJESTIC) heats up! A funeral is planned for a fallen hero, and it brings out a range of emotions across the entire town. From the surly, formerly villainous locals to his allies and friends, this event will be one for the history books. Amid the happenings, Lindo is piecing together what happened and is looking to bring the murderer to justice - no matter who it is!
summary.name: Snake in the Grass

name: Welcome to Tranquility #001 (2007-02-01) - Fade to Grey.cbr

summary.description: From the incredible minds of Gail Simone (GEN13, BIRDS OF PREY) and Neil Googe (MAJESTIC) comes a unique new series that will change the way you think about super-heroes and villains! Tranquility is like any other small town in America, except for one fundamental difference: It's the town where super-powered beings go in order to retire and raise families. From the Golden Age to the Modern Age, heroes and villains alike reside in Tranquility, and it creates a unique blend of personalities and conflicts that causes the local law enforcement nothing but headaches! As a camera crew is in town to film a news segment on this unique place, the town is turned upside down by a murder...and it becomes evident that everything isn't as quaint as it seems!
summary.name: Fade to Grey

name: Welcome Back #002 (2015-10-31) .cbr

summary.description: As Tessa flies to America to continue hunting her target, Mali learns the ropes of being a soldier while the memories of hundreds of past lives weigh on her mind.

name: Welcome Back #001 (2015-08-31) .cbr

summary.description:
What’s to Love: We believe Christopher Sebela is one of the most exciting new comic writers and his idea of reincarnated assassins who are forever fighting, killing, and loving each other throughout endless lives is another reason why. Plus, Jonathan Brandon Sawyer’s (Critical Hit) expressive art style reminds us of Becky Cloonan and Sean Gordon Murphy, and it’s just perfect for Welcome Back.

What It Is: Mali and Tessa have lived hundreds of different lives throughout time, caught up in an eternal cycle as they take part in a war so old that neither side remembers what they’re fighting for anymore. As Mali wakes up in her newest life, she suddenly becomes self-aware and starts to question everything, especially why she continues to fight. But elsewhere, Tessa is already on the hunt...

List of covers and their creators:
